official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to transfer the Coast Guard vessel INGHAM to the Naval and Maritime Museum at Patriots Point, South Carolina.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to transfer, without consideration, the Coast Guard vessel "Ingham" to the Naval and Maritime Museum at Patriots Point, South Carolina.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to transfer the Coast Guard vessel INGHAM to the Naval and Maritime Museum at Patriots Point, South Carolina.
